releases.notes: No real changes, just demo for release tool.

name: Wolfenstein 3D Pain Face
description:
Show your level of pain with a Wolfenstein 3D inspired pain face.

 * Use W'bal, heart rate or power output for the pain source.
 * State of the art graphics (for 1992)
 * May induce feelings of nostalgia.
 * Mein Leben!!!

releases.notes:
- removed "experimental" from the Points Leaderboard name
- The points leaderboard and segment results settings pages will now show a sample of the scores based on the input you give it so you can validate that it behaves the way you expect before racing.  The sample will show along the right hand side of the window.
- Score formats for the points leaderboard and segment results can now be in MATLAB colon notation (ie. 20:-1:1 is the same as 20..1 or 20:-2:1 would be the same as 20..1 with a step of -2)
- the Route Preview window now has an option to choose an event and pen and it will automatically select the route and if applicable the number of laps or custom distance.
- various minor tweaks and fixes

name: Zenmaster
description:
Arend's Mod Collection

* Fully customizable route elevation profiles
* See the active powerups in your group when the HUD is off
* Segment leaderboards
* Preview route and segment profiles
* Pace partner routes and current locations
* Lap data windows for workouts
* Leaderboards for points races
